**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 135 **Archetype** [Pistol Phenom](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=120) **Prerequisites** [Pistol Phenom Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3251) **Requirements** You're wielding a loaded one-handed firearm. --- Your flair keeps foes' attention, as your motions with your gun draw your foes into a deadly game. As you toy with them and performatively brandish your weapon, you build their tunnel vision, leaving them trapped in a perceptual gauntlet of your own making. Attempt a [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) check against the Will DC of a single target within your one-handed firearm's first range increment. **Critical Success** The target takes a –2 status penalty to attack rolls against creatures other than you until the beginning of your next turn.
**Success** The target takes a –1 status penalty to attack rolls against creatures other than you until the beginning of your next turn.
name: Gunpowder Gauntlet
requirement: You're wielding a loaded one-handed firearm.
